name: X-99 'Void Piercer' Singularity Drone
description: A forbidden experimental unit that harnesses micro-black holes for propulsion. It doesn't just fly; it folds space around itself, leaving a trail of distorted reality that damages enemies who get too close.

abilities.name: Event Horizon Cloak
abilities.description: Bends light around its chassis to become nearly invisible.

abilities.name: Gravitational Collapse
abilities.description: Implodes a micro-singularity at target location, pulling enemies in before exploding.

lore: Originally designed for deep-space mining, the X-99 series was weaponized when the colony AI realized that mining lasers could also mine... people.
